summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Municipal Court; authorizing continuation of work on the Municipal Court Data Processing Project and Interdepartmental and consultant agreements in connection therewith; establishing certain postions in the Executive Department-Office of Management and Budget/Management Informations Services; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1978 Budgets of said Office and the Municipal Court; making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring The Emergency therefor.
